game.name: Tech Blast
game.shortDescription: Tech Blast is an action-puzzle game where a young mechanic explores an abandoned planet, solving puzzles, building mechanisms, and battling ore insects.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tech Blast is an action-puzzle game where a young mechanic explores an abandoned planet, solving puzzles, building mechanisms, and battling ore insects.

reviewHighlights.text: Wanky game no option for anything controls are allover with the response input feels like a test beta so no. WHY does it have pozitive reviews at that...
